cast.overview: After ten years of doing nothing, Orel and Gringe are in their mid 30s and they struggle to finish their first rap album. Their texts are mostly sex jokes and booze stories and reflect the everyday life they have in a small town from France. The problem is that they never really finished a song and when their producers want to meet, they have to face a new challenge : finish their first song in the next 24h. Their old issues, the fear of failure, their alcoholic friends and annoying girlfriends won't help them to do so, or will they ?
cast.title: Comment c'est loin

details.biography:
Redouanne Harjane, born February 6, 1984 in Metz, is a comedian, musician and French actor.

Redouanne is passionate from childhood for theater, music and literature. He left school at 14, and took his first steps as an actor at the National Conservatory of Metz. He studied jazz, and then perfected his practice of several instruments at the International Academy of Music.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
details.name: Redouanne Harjane
